body_html: Thank you @JonathanRaiman for putting a lot of thought into communicating this issue. You've indicated you suspect there is a memory leak in the C++ code. In that case, @zhifengc might be able to advise you on how to troubleshoot down to the precise bug, or perhaps look into it himself.

body: Thank you @JonathanRaiman for putting a lot of thought into communicating this issue. You've indicated you suspect there is a memory leak in the C++ code. In that case, @zhifengc might be able to advise you on how to troubleshoot down to the precise bug, or perhaps look into it himself.
